Title: Redesignates certain sex, prostitution, obscenity and sexual performance offenses committed against a child as class A-I felonies with a sentence of life imprisonment without parole
Summary: Redesignates certain sex, prostitution, obscenity and sexual performance offenses committed against a child as class A-I felonies with a sentence of life imprisonment without parole.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the penal law, in relation to sex offenses, prostitution offenses, obscenity offenses and sexual performance by a child offense committed against a minor
